overview: Highly regarded as a leading technical electronic banking specialist, Wayne Robinson has specialised in IT solutions in the banking industry since 1971. Both as a consultant and in-house, he has wide experience in software development, project management and senior IT management. He has designed and developed real-time banking systems and been responsible for the delivery of transaction switches, ATM systems, phone banking, credit/debit card systems, loyalty systems and lately e-Commerce - including payment gateways and a multi-merchant Internet shopping mall. He combines the technical and business expertise required for the design of secure systems that meet customers’ current business needs.
